faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about AI Comment Replyer
faq.q1: How does AI comment reply work?
faq.a1: Our AI analyzes incoming comments and generates contextual, brand-aligned responses in seconds. You can customize tone, style, and approve responses before they go live.
faq.a2: Currently, we support Facebook Pages and Instagram. We're continuously expanding to other social media platforms based on user demand.
faq.a3: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, comply with GDPR standards, and never share your data with third parties. Your account and comments are fully protected.
faq.q4: Can I customize the AI responses?
faq.a4: Yes! You can set custom rules, tone preferences, response templates, and approval workflows. The AI learns from your brand voice and improves over time.
faq.q5: What happens if the AI makes a mistake?
faq.a5: All responses can be set to require manual approval before posting. You can also edit, reject, or provide feedback on any generated response to help the AI learn.
